document_data.name: Tongue of Madness
document_data.mainbody: '''Tongue of madness''' was a fungus that grew in the [[Underdark]]. When mature, it resembled a large human tongue and was edible but somewhat poisonous. When consumed, any creature with the power of speech who did not have sufficient constitution to resist the mind-altering effects was compelled to speak his or her every thought for the next hour. This compulsion could be cured by a ''[[lesser restoration]]'' or similar spell.
